import React from "react"; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; import imageOverlay from "../img/contact.JPEG"; class Contact extends React.Component { render() { function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.init("user_7dMeZqBDndpiiduS2Qqu8"); emailjs.sendForm('gmail', 'template_86ri4dm', e.target, 'user_7dMeZqBDndpiiduS2Qqu8') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); e.target.reset() } return (
